page.name: samples
page.summary: The utility of any application framework can be discovered three ways. The first is introductory material that explains what the framework does. The second is detailed API documentation and usage patterns. The third, and perhaps the most important, is by looking at sample applications and actual code. This page describes the many sample applications provided with the Sparx Evaluation Kit, all of which are also available online.
page.section:
Sparx includes hundreds of pages of both online (HTML) and offline (PDF) documention. To get the most ouf the sample applications described below, please review the documents described below and follow along.
Document Samples Covered Purpose
Sparx Developers Guide Volume I Hello, Library
Describes the two primary means for evaluating Sparx -- online and offline. Furthermore, it explains how to install Sparx onto your local servers and how to peruse the source code online. It then introduces Sparx by describing most of the functionality and walking the reader through the development of two full-scale sample applications hello and library (Hello World and the Sparx Library).
Sparx Developers Guide Volume II Cura
Provides examples that demonstrate the advanced functions available in Sparx. This is primarily done by walking the reader through the implementation of a sophisticated project management application called Cura.
